conclusion: Analyze liquid flow from containers A, B, C, D to E, F, G through baffles.
Containers A, B, C, D at top with red arrows pointing to them.
Several angled baffles in the middle to redirect liquid flow.
Containers E, F, G at bottom with red arrows pointing to them.
Liquid flows straight down from container A.
Liquid from A hits black baffle angled top-left to bottom-right, deflecting right.
Liquid from A hits white baffle angled top-right to bottom-left, redirecting leftward.
Liquid from A flows into container E.
Liquid flows straight down from container B.
Liquid from B hits yellow baffle angled top-left to bottom-right, deflecting right.
Liquid from B continues down and right into container F.
Liquid flows straight down from container C.
Liquid from C hits white horizontal baffle, redirecting slightly right.
Liquid from C hits gray baffle angled top-left to bottom-right, deflecting further right.
Liquid from C flows into container G.
Liquid flows straight down from container D.
Liquid from D does not encounter any baffles and continues straight down.
Liquid from D flows into container G.
Final answer: Liquid from A flows into E, B into F, C into G, D into G.
